                                                              boolean treatModifiersOutside)
        Finds the parent type of a node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node inside the type to find
        treatModifiersOutside - if set, modifiers are not part of their type, but of the type's parent
        Returns:
        returns either a AbstractTypeDeclaration or an AnonymousTypeDeclaration
